item.title: Reconstructed road opens grand views at Theodore Roosevelt National Park
item.description: Part of a scenic road loop in North Dakota’s Theodore Roosevelt National Park is reopening after being closed for over six years

item.title: More than 100 homes damaged by tornado near Houston
item.description: More than 100 homes have been damaged after a tornado touched down in a residential area outside Houston

item.title: Viola Ford Fletcher, one of the last 1921 Tulsa Race Massacre survivors, dies age 111
item.description: One of the last known survivors of the 1921 Tulsa Race Massacre in Oklahoma has died

item.title: Gramma the Galápagos tortoise, oldest resident of San Diego Zoo, dies at about 141
item.description: The beloved Galápagos tortoise named Gramma that was the oldest resident of the San Diego Zoo at an estimated 141 years has died

item.title: Oregon's governor declares emergency to ensure the state gets enough fuel after pipeline leak
item.description: Oregon's governor has declared a state of emergency to ensure fuel supplies continue despite the shutdown of the Olympic Pipeline due to a leak
